lines.text: Thou has done well, my son. To few, indeed, of thy race have the secrets of the yogi been revealed.
To you, my teacher, I express my thanks. What more can I learn?
Nothing now. The world needs thee. Go forth in the youth and strength and conquer the evil that threatens Mankind.
So, unless my people will join in making you a modern pharaoh, you will annihilate them?

[laughing]
Pharaoh? I shall be greater than any pharaoh! Civilization and all its works shall be destroyed! Men shall return to savagery following only one supreme intelligence... me!
Have you been married since you last saw me?
That's one feat of magic that requires a beautiful assistant.
I love the looks of the desert but hare the taste of it.

[to Abdullah]
If Nadji opposes me, and you serve me well, there shall be a new slave in your harem.
